com.irurueta.server.commons.useragent

Class UserAgentDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.useragent.UserAgentDetector

  • public class UserAgentDetector
extends Object
    Class to parse and process a user agent from a web browser, web crawler, bot, email client, RESt library, etc. This class will detect which kind of user agent made a request, operating system information of the requester, kind of device, etc.

      Fields

      Logger for this class.

      Amount of user agents that are cached.

      Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not.

      Internal user agent string parser.
      private static SoftReference<UserAgentDetector> mReference
      Singleton instance of UserAgentDetector stored in a soft reference (to keep it cached in memory unless memory is claimed).

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UserAgentDetector getInstance()
        Factory method to return the singleton instance of UserAgentDetector based on current configuration.
        Returns:
        singleton instance.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not. If not enabled no user agent detection will be done when requested.
        Returns:
        true if user agent detection is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getCacheSize

        public int getCacheSize()
        Amount of user agents that are cached. A cache of user agents is used to speed up the parsing process when user agents get repeated, which can happen if a user makes several requests to the server, or multiple users have the same user agent
        Returns:
        amount of user agents that are cached.

      • getCacheExpirationTime

        public int getCacheExpirationTime()
        Amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.
        Returns:
        amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.

      • detect

        public UserAgentData detect(String userAgentString)
                     throws UserAgentDetectionDisabledException,
                            UserAgentException
        Detects data on provided user agent string. Detected data can be operating system, user agent type (browser, mail client, etc), user agent family, type of device, etc.
        Parameters:
        userAgentString - original user agent string being parsed
        Returns:
        detected user agent data.
        Throws:
        UserAgentDetectionDisabledException - if user agent detection is disabled.
        UserAgentException - if anything else fails.

      • close

        public void close()
        Stops internal user agent parser. Once closed, user agent detection will no longer be available.

      • reset

        protected static void reset()
        Resets UserAgentDetector so a new instance having new configuration can be created.

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
        This method is called on garbage collection. When this method is called, internal user agent parser will be stopped.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
        Throws:
        Throwable - if anything fails.

      • toDeviceCategory

        protected DeviceCategory toDeviceCategory(net.sf.uadetector.ReadableDeviceCategory.Category category)
        Converts an internal device category enumerator into a DeviceCategory enumerator used by this package.
        Parameters:
        category - internal category to be converted.
        Returns:
        a device category.

        Converts an internal OS family enumerator into an OperatingSystemFamily. enumerator used by this package.
